perturbation.original_text: 6.1 Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement. PC Financial shall pay to Mobimagic a fixed service fee in the amount of 970,000 United States Dollars (USD 970,000) for each month (the "Fee") within the timeline as permitted under the prevailing India regulations. It is stipulated in this Agreement that Mobimagic will send an invoice to PC Financial on monthly basis according to the progress of the service. After PC Financial confirms that invoice contents are correct, PC Financial shall pay within 45 days after confirming thus.
perturbation.changed_text: 6.1 Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement. PC Financial shall pay to Mobimagic a fixed service fee in the amount of 970,000 United States Dollars (USD 970,000) for each month (the "Consideration") within the timeline as permitted under the prevailing India regulations. It is stipulated in this Agreement that Mobimagic will send an invoice to PC Financial on monthly basis according to the progress of the service. perturbation.explanation: Changing the term 'Fee' to 'Consideration' in section 6.1, introduces a contradiction, as the rest of the document uses the term 'Fee' when referring to the amount PC Financial should pay Mobimagic. By changing this term to 'Consideration' this affects the enforcement of payment terms since the definition of 'Fee' is now different from what is referenced through out the rest of the contract, for example in section 6.3.
